group_1.textLeft: YOU'RE the only one who's late!

group_1.textRight: C'mon, don't be like that.@...So, have you guys come up with a plan?

group_1.textLeft: We're just getting started.

group_1.textRight: This'll be fun.
A revenge operation, courtesy of Mami!

group_1.textLeft: That's not really the point, though.
We're not here to help you and Nagisa plot@your revenge...
Their motive is irrelevant.
Kyoko and Nagisa have both agreed to help us@fight it.

group_1.textRight: Yep, that's right.
Mami told me that when I took her up@on her offer.

group_1.textLeft: ...Well, if Mami's okay with that,@I guess that's fine.
Besides, it would be very helpful to get some@firsthand information...
from the two who've fought it once before.

group_1.textRight: ...Could you tell us how dangerous@the Witch was?
...And so, it's a real tough one.
My spear couldn't even scratch 'em.

group_1.textLeft: Could it have been a poor match-up for you?

group_1.textRight: Might've been.

group_1.textLeft: How would my fireworks perform?

group_1.textRight: Fireworks...?@Oh, the weapon you use with that costume.
Not bad, I guess?@I don't think it'd hit too hard, though.

group_1.textLeft: How was it for you, Nagisa?

group_1.textRight: I was supposed to be covering for Kyoko, but...
The next thing I knew, I was surrounded@by Familiars and got into trouble...
Yeah, it had tons of lackeys too.

group_1.textLeft: Such a strong Witch...@How did you escape?

group_1.textRight: While Nagisa was distracting them with@her bubbles,
I transformed my spear and tied up the Witch.
I gave it a good whack, and for a second,@the Labyrinth was open.

group_1.textLeft: I see...

group_1.textRight: ...Then, what kind of strategy would you@suggest?
Maybe we can get Homura to use her magic@to stop time...?

group_1.textLeft: I suppose... But according to Kyoko, the two@of you were able to keep it in place, yes?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, guess so.
But just holdin' it down wasn't gonna settle@anything, though, so we hightailed it outta there.
...We can use the same technique.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, we'll need Kyoko and Nagisa to immobilize@the Witch.

group_1.textRight: Okay!
What about the horde of Familiars?@They're pretty nasty.
Homura, Sayaka, and I can handle it...!

group_1.textLeft: Very well... Our roles will be different from@the last time we tried this, though.

group_1.textRight: It's okay.
We need to be able to play different roles@when we change members.
So...@The last thing we need is Mami's fireworks!

group_1.textLeft: I'll take care of it.

group_1.textRight: Hmm... You've changed your fightin' style@pretty drastically from the old Mami.

group_1.textLeft: I have a group of dependable juniors now.
I have to change, too.

group_1.textCenter: Hmm, I can make it a little stronger, but...
How can I make the fireworks larger and@more powerful?
Tomorrow's another school day...@I don't want to be up too late.
